Player History
Signed as a free agent by California on 3/1/1967 to a minor league contract.
Drafted in 2nd round, 33rd overall pick, by Boston in 1976...
Injured on 4/6/1976 with a Bruised Ulna, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/1/1982 with a Broken Ribs, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 4/12/1983 with a Tight Knee, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 8/15/1983, off Tom Bradley (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 10/2/1983, off Mike Flanagan (OAK)...
Injured on 8/11/1984 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Drafted in 3rd round, 43rd overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1995...
Injured on 4/11/1996 with a Pinched Nerve Neck, out for 5 days...
